definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: YAG laser has been used to machine rectangular-shaped holes of about several microns in width.
sentences.chinese: 用YAG激光器加工出了幾微米寬的長方孔。

sentences.english: Tyre chars acquired rough surfaces with blowholes a few micrometres wide.
sentences.chinese: 而輪胎焦卻形成帶有幾微米直徑氣孔的粗糙表面。

sentences.english: Reclaim is defined as the removal of several microns of the silicon wafer and subsequent re-polishing of the wafer surface.
sentences.chinese: 回收硅片即將硅片削去幾微米，再對其表面進行磨光。
